title: Daily Telescope: A view of our star as Earth reaches perihelion
summary: There is a bit of irony for those of us who live in the Northern Hemisphere.

title: National Labor Relations Board issues complaint over SpaceX employee firings
summary: The National Labor Relations Board (NLRB) is proceeding with a complaint against SpaceX by eight former employees who allege they were illegally fired for circulating an open letter within the company.

title: SpaceX launches Ovzon’s debut broadband satellite
summary: Swedish satcom service provider Ovzon’s first fully owned satellite lifted off on a SpaceX Falcon 9 rocket Jan. 3, closing a chapter on years of launch and manufacturing setbacks for the broadband spacecraft.

title: Progress Made at SaxaVord, but Questions Remain
summary:
Last month, the UK’s Civil Aviation Authority awarded a spaceport license to SaxaVord, granting it permission to perform 30 launches per year from Unst, a small island off the Northern coast of Scotland. Construction of the spaceport is, however, yet to be completed. While SaxaVord and its management team made a victory lap towards the […]

title: Bumpy Road Ahead for the Remainder of the 118th Congress
